TopicTitle: The tiniest plane I could manage

Articles.Content:
So I decided to try and see just how small I could make an aeroplane, this spawned out of my determination to build a plane with no wings (only winglets) using only parts from the first 3 tiers of the tech tree, and evolved over the space of my new Science save into this:

![tumblr_nordhn8e8H1uwrx6xo1_1280.png](https://36.media.tumblr.com/c1915a287bb27de9c1de41594c3887a0/tumblr_nordhn8e8H1uwrx6xo1_1280.png)

![tumblr_nordhn8e8H1uwrx6xo5_1280.png](https://41.media.tumblr.com/2825b76168241ec44d955db2e3401a52/tumblr_nordhn8e8H1uwrx6xo5_1280.png)

I call it the SSR Pigmy-1.

it is 15 parts, 3.9tons and 3.4m x 4.3m x 4m

I'm still pretty early on in this save, also haven't dipped into using the mods I have for this yet, I plan to make smaller better crafts as time goes on!

If anyone else has done similar things please post them I'd love to see!
Woah, that is really tiny ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) Nice work!

Tried to make it better, discovered that you can surface attach the basic fins to each other, made a tri-plane,**it is 3.2m x 3.7m x 4m, 3.8tons** although significantly more parts due to the wings being multiple parts joined (now 33 parts). only modded part is the KW rocketry fuel tank (which i thought was smaller than the stock one but since the length of both craft is 4m i guess it isnt)

I really don't know what I can do to make it smaller short of making some of my own parts specifically for the purpose (tempting) but I feel that might be a bit cheaty unless I really put work into balancing them well into the game, we shall see, got other projects at the moment anyway so that'll probably have to wait.

![tumblr_norfija5MO1uwrx6xo1_1280.png](https://40.media.tumblr.com/bfd4d4b4ad0e2baa9d367c2d8777bfcc/tumblr_norfija5MO1uwrx6xo1_1280.png)

![tumblr_norfija5MO1uwrx6xo2_1280.png](https://36.media.tumblr.com/3a8ae5a861027651e5828d758838b2e1/tumblr_norfija5MO1uwrx6xo2_1280.png)![tumblr_norfija5MO1uwrx6xo4_1280.png](https://36.media.tumblr.com/fca8d07974ff27c29fc25f9b56e4ce5a/tumblr_norfija5MO1uwrx6xo4_1280.png)![tumblr_norfija5MO1uwrx6xo3_1280.png](https://40.media.tumblr.com/a2a04df9f75b35a0ac7b23331d92aa60/tumblr_norfija5MO1uwrx6xo3_1280.png)

I really want to see if people can make anything smaller! show me what you can come up with!
Check out the Challenges thread- there's an entire challenge devoted to just this.

If you don't mind using mods may I recommend "TweekScale" which lets you scale up/down the stock (or modded) parts so that you can get much more variety in the designs of smaller craft. If you scale down the engines then the power delivery is automatically scaled down too, as is the capacity of fuel tanks etc. I've only recently tried it but it's been a revelation so far...

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/112693](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/112693)
